directions: Combine first 5 ingredients in medium bowl. Cover and refrigerate. (Can be prepared 2 days ahead. Keep refrigerated.)
ingredients: 1 cup canned crushed tomatoes with added puree
2 jalapeño chilies, seeded but not deveined, minced
12 snow crab claws or cooked jumbo shrimp, shelled, deveined
title: Shellfish with Spicy Island Dip
